Select: Select UWI, FINAL_TD, WELL_NAME, SURFACE_LATITUDE, SURFACE_LONGITUDE,LEASE_NAME, DEPTH_DATUM_ELEV, DEPTH_DATUM, OPERATOR, ASSIGNED_FIELD, CURRENT_STATUS,GROUND_ELEV, REMARK, ROW_CHANGED_DATE, ROW_CHANGED_BY from WELL

DataObjects.Select: Select UWI, CURVE_ID, NULL_REPRESENTATION, VALUE_COUNT, MAX_INDEX, MIN_INDEX, ROW_CHANGED_DATE, ROW_CHANGED_BY from well_log_curve

Arrays.Select: select STRING_AGG(cast(INDEX_VALUE as NVARCHAR(max)), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY INDEX_VALUE ASC) AS ARRAY from well_log_curve_value
select STRING_AGG(cast(MEASURED_VALUE as NVARCHAR(max)), ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY INDEX_VALUE ASC) AS ARRAY from well_log_curve_value

DataObjects.Select: Select STRAT_NAME_SET_ID, STRAT_UNIT_ID, UWI, INTERP_ID, DOMINANT_LITHOLOGY, PICK_DEPTH,REMARK, ROW_CHANGED_DATE, ROW_CHANGED_BY  from STRAT_WELL_SECTION
